Class HubListenerAdapter

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.hub.HubListenerAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
HubListener, java.util.EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
Hub2TreeNode, HubAutoMatch, HubAutoSequence, HubCacheAdder, HubFilter, HubSortListener, JFCController
public class HubListenerAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements HubListener

Adapter class that implements HubListener Interface.

beforePropertyChange

public void beforePropertyChange(HubEvent e)
Description copied from interface: HubListener
Event sent whenever a property is changed. This includes OAObject or Hub properties.
OAObject: any object property, changed, editable, new
Hub: allowDelete, allowNew, allowEdit, eof, bof

Note: propertyChanges are sent for any changed object, not just the ActiveObject

Specified by:
beforePropertyChange in interface HubListener
See Also:
OAObject.fireBeforePropertyChange, Hub.firePropertyChange

beforeRemove

public void beforeRemove(HubEvent e)
Description copied from interface: HubListener
Event sent before an object is removed from a Hub. This is needed for cases where the remove will be doing other work. For example: to create an Undo.

Specified by:
beforeRemove in interface HubListener
